ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend it to someone working in OCT or interferometry. It was a bit too specific to be very relevant to even those working in fluorescent microscopy, but expanding some of the topic materials to microscopy in general would broaden the appeal of the course.
An interesting course that goes into the specifics of optical coherence tomography.

Great class. It has a heavy emphasis on optical coherence tomography and a little on confocal microscopy. Selected topics in optics were covered as they relate to these imaging techniques (e.g., geometric optics, coherence, speckle statistics, spectrometers,...)
A comprehesive overview to optical imaging.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: OCT is very similar to ultrasound, which is the modality that I will use for my research.
